on reading compounds: 欺騙【キヘン】deception, deceit, cheating, military deception
kun reading compounds: 騙る【かたる】to swindle out of, to cheat out of, to defraud of, to misrepresent oneself as, to pretend to be, to assume (a name or title), to falsify (e.g. a seal)
騙す【だます】to trick, to cheat, to deceive, to coax, to wheedle, to soothe and humor (humour)
